document_data.name: Windstone
document_data.mainbody: '''Windstone''' was one of the Palace families who served the Crown of [[Cormyr]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History: By the late 15{{th}} century DR, Windstones were career officiers for multiple generations. Like other officers and chamberlains, the Windstone family resided at [[Cormyr's Royal Court]] south of [[Castle Obarskyr]]. Lady [[Jalessa Windstone]] took office of the [[Lady of Graces]] in the {{YearlinkName|1472}}.
